name: Working Title Vampire Game
description:
Our vampire character just got back home after going out for a late night snack, only to find his mansion got taken over by a bunch of monsters! Help him get rid of them and take back his home!

To get from one room to the next, gather all of the gems in the room. Otherwise, you won't be able to enter the next room. The boss is the witch, so once you've beaten her, you win!

Controls

W- Jump

A - Move Left

D- Move Right

Space - Throw Swords
